scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn ts && yarn unit && yarn detox-ci
scripts.test-commit: yarn lint && yarn ts && yarn unit
scripts.rca: cd ./android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew uninstallAll && cd .. && yarn ra
scripts.apks: yarn apk-staging && yarn apk-prod && yarn apk-prod-unsigned
scripts.apk-staging: npx jetify && cd ./android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease --stacktrace && open app/build/outputs/apk/staging/release && cd ..
scripts.apk-prod: npx jetify && cd ./android && ./gradlew assembleProdRelease --stacktrace && open app/build/outputs/apk/prod/release && cd ..
scripts.apk-prod-unsigned: npx jetify && yarn run bundle-android && cd ./android && ./gradlew assembleProdUnsigned --stacktrace && open app/build/outputs/apk/prod/unsigned && cd .. && yarn run clean-android
scripts.run-android-staging: cd ./android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew uninstallAll && cd .. && yarn ra
scripts.run-android-prod: cd ./android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew uninstallAll && cd .. && react-native run-android --variant prodDebug --appId com.appstarter.prod
scripts.build-android-staging: cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew uninstallAll && ./gradlew installStagingRelease && cd ..
scripts.build-android-prod: cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew uninstallAll && ./gradlew installProdRelease && cd ..
scripts.bundle-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.clean-android: rm ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/raw && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi
scripts.detox-ios-staging-debug: detox build --configuration ios.staging.debug && detox test --configuration ios.staging.debug
scripts.detox-ios-staging-release: detox build --configuration ios.staging.release && detox test --configuration ios.staging.release
scripts.detox-ios-prod-debug: detox build --configuration ios.prod.debug && detox test --configuration ios.prod.debug
scripts.detox-ios-prod-release: detox build --configuration ios.prod.release && detox test --configuration ios.prod.release
scripts.detox-android-staging-debug: detox build --configuration android.staging.debug && detox test --configuration android.staging.debug
scripts.detox-android-staging-release: detox build --configuration android.staging.release && detox test --configuration android.staging.release
scripts.detox-android-prod-debug: detox build --configuration android.prod.debug && detox test --configuration android.prod.debug
scripts.detox-android-prod-release: detox build --configuration android.prod.release && detox test --configuration android.prod.release
